mapper.select: SELECT car.id , brand.name_brand , model.name_model , config.type_configuration , config.description_configuration, car.date_builder , car.price FROM car_shop.car car JOIN car_shop.brand brand ON car.id_brand=brand.id JOIN car_shop.model model ON car.id_model=model.id JOIN car_shop.configuration config ON car.id_configuration=config.id

SELECT car.id , brand.name_brand , model.name_model , config.type_configuration , config.description_configuration , car.date_builder , car.price FROM car_shop.car car LEFT JOIN car_shop.brand brand ON car.id_brand=brand.id LEFT JOIN car_shop.model model ON car.id_model=model.id LEFT JOIN car_shop.configuration config ON car.id_configuration=config.id WHERE brand.name_brand=#{brandName}

SELECT car.id , brand.name_brand , model.name_model , config.type_configuration , config.description_configuration , car.date_builder , car.price FROM car_shop.car car LEFT JOIN car_shop.brand brand ON car.id_brand=brand.id LEFT JOIN car_shop.model model ON car.id_model=model.id LEFT JOIN car_shop.configuration config ON car.id_configuration=config.id WHERE model.name_model=#{modelName}

SELECT car.id , brand.name_brand , model.name_model , config.type_configuration , config.description_configuration , car.date_builder , car.price FROM car_shop.car car LEFT JOIN car_shop.brand brand ON car.id_brand=brand.id LEFT JOIN car_shop.model model ON car.id_model=model.id LEFT JOIN car_shop.configuration config ON car.id_configuration=config.id WHERE brand.name_brand=#{brandName} OR model.name_model=#{modelName}
